name: workflow (Peti)
description:
Putting in effort to avoid boring effort
Work is boring, but talking to friends isn't. Too bad your boss is a grouchy phone-hating boomer.
Text your friends while pretending that you're a contributing member of society.

=CONTROLS=
Looking:
W to look up, A to look over your shoulder.

Typing:
Mashing any (other)key / Left Click held down

Interacting:
Left Click

Pausing:
Esc

=CREDITS=
Music:
https://audionautix.com/

Sound Effects:
https://www.zapsplat.com/

=AUTHOR NOTE=
This was my first venture into web export. It was an interesting experience, but ultimately it worked out! I'm glad that I got to learn it as it opened a lot more doors.

As for the game itself, I was inspired to make a social media game that was typing focused. At first I thought about doing something with Twitter, but that idea didn't really go anywhere. I settled on replying on Discord while trying to avoid being caught, that's something most of us can relate to these days.

=SOURCE CODE=
